name: Bug Buster (Z4KKD)
description:
A 3d top-down orthographic twin-stick survival shooter made in unity. 

Survive waves of alien bugs that progress and get harder with bosses. 

Collect coins and level up to upgrade your shooter in the research area. 

Find keys around the ship to unlock new areas. 

Care packages drop in at the end of every wave. 

Can be used with a controller or mouse and keyboard. 

This is my third game, feedback would be great for future projects or for improving this one!

 My Patreon https://www.patreon.com/Z4KKD
